sentences.en: A frosted-blond anchorwoman with a sympathetic manner interviewed me for over an hour.
sentences.cn: 一位稍有银发、金发碧眼的女主持人，举手投足间带着同情心，采访了我一个多小时。

sentences.en: This tape, work of former Raccoon 7 anchorwoman Terri Morales.
sentences.cn: 这盘带子, 是前浣熊市7频道主播泰瑞莫拉斯拍摄的.

trans.tran_en: The anchorwoman on a television or radio programme, especially a news programme, is the woman who presents it
